messages.title: Supporting Our Local Community
messages.content: "I know Sam will always be here for everyone in our community of Hertsmere and will make an excellent MP." - David Akinola, Local Resident

messages.title: Putting local people first
messages.content: Sam listens to the people of Hertsmere

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Every family in Hertsmere now has access to a Sure Start Centre in their community thanks to a Labour government.
Labour pioneered the minimum wage and has consistently championed the rights of workers to get a fair deal.
Continuing investment in the NHS has dramatically reduced waiting times and provided many more doctors and nurses serving Hertsmere.

issues.education: Every family in Hertsmere now has access to a Sure Start Centre in their community thanks to a Labour government.
issues.governance: No second home - just a commitment to being open and honest as your MP.
issues.health: Continuing investment in the NHS has dramatically reduced waiting times and provided many more doctors and nurses serving Hertsmere.

housing.content: I will work to make sure those who cannot afford their own home will not lose their home.

leaflet.personalStatement: I’m proud to be standing as your Labour candidate for Parliament. My family have lived in Hertsmere for over fifteen years - I’m a local voice who understands the needs of our community and will deliver for you. At a time when the standing of MPs is at an all time low, it’s time for someone who is focussed on your needs, not their expenses. If elected, you will always be my number one priority.

contactInformation.address: Hertsmere Labour Party, 40 Park Avenue, Potters Bar, EN6 5EJ

endorsements.endorsement: "I know Sam will always be here for everyone in our community of Hertsmere and will make an excellent MP."

images.caption: Sam listens to the people of Hertsmere

leaflet.additionalNotes: My pledges to you... - To rebuild trust in politics - To protect your home - To support the local economy - To improve local transport - To help develop strong communities
